16  nodelet::Nodelet);

18 typedef pcl::PointXYZ PointXYZ;

20 namespace pses_kinect_utilities

22 
23 void VoxelGridFilterNodelet::onInit()
24 {
25  NODELET_DEBUG("Initializing voxel grid filter nodelet...");
26 
27  ros::NodeHandle& private_nh = getPrivateNodeHandle();
28  nh_ = getNodeHandle();
29 
30  // Init dynamic reconfigure
31  reconfigureServer = boost::make_shared <dynamic_reconfigure::Server<VoxelGridFilterConfig>> (private_nh);
32  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<VoxelGridFilterConfig>::CallbackType f;
33  f = boost::bind(&VoxelGridFilterNodelet::dynReconfCb, this, _1, _2);
34  reconfigureServer->setCallback(f);
35 
36  filtered_cloud_.reset(new PointCloud);
37 
38  // Read parameters
39  private_nh.param("queue_size", queue_size_, 1);
40  private_nh.param<std::string>("tf_frame", tf_frame_, "kinect2_link");
41 
42  // Monitor whether anyone is subscribed to the output
43  ros::SubscriberStatusCallback connect_cb =
44  boost::bind(&VoxelGridFilterNodelet::connectCb, this);
45  // Make sure we don't enter connectCb() between advertising and assigning to
46  boost::lock_guard<boost::mutex> lock(connect_mutex_);
47  pub_cloud_ =
48  nh_.advertise<PointCloud>("cloud_out", 1, connect_cb, connect_cb);
49 }
50 
51 void VoxelGridFilterNodelet::connectCb()
52 {
53  boost::lock_guard<boost::mutex> lock(connect_mutex_);
54  if (pub_cloud_.getNumSubscribers() == 0)
55  {
56  NODELET_INFO("Stopping voxel grid filter...");
57  sub_cloud_.shutdown();
58  }
59  else if (!sub_cloud_)
60  {
61  NODELET_INFO("Running voxel grid filter...");
62  sub_cloud_ = nh_.subscribe<PointCloud>(
63  "cloud_in", queue_size_,
64  boost::bind(&VoxelGridFilterNodelet::pointCloudCb, this, _1));
65  }
66 }
67 
68 void VoxelGridFilterNodelet::pointCloudCb(const PointCloud::ConstPtr& cloud_msg)
69 {
70  pcl::VoxelGrid<PointXYZ> vox;
71  vox.setInputCloud(cloud_msg);
72  // The leaf size is more or less the size of voxels. Note that these values
73  // affect what a good threshold value would be.
74  vox.setLeafSize(config_.leaf_size, config_.leaf_size, config_.leaf_size);
75  // This limits the overall volume of points. Being "far away" points
76  // considered as irrelevant.
77  vox.setFilterLimits(config_.min_filter_limit, config_.max_filter_limit);
78  // The line below is perhaps the most important as it reduces ghost points.
79  vox.setMinimumPointsNumberPerVoxel(config_.min_points_per_voxel);
80  vox.filter(*filtered_cloud_);
81  filtered_cloud_->header.frame_id = tf_frame_;
82  pub_cloud_.publish(filtered_cloud_);
83 }
84 
85 void VoxelGridFilterNodelet::dynReconfCb(
86  VoxelGridFilterConfig& inputConfig, uint32_t level)
87 {
88  config_ = inputConfig;
89  NODELET_INFO("Reconfigured voxel grid filter params");
90 }
